name: Rotten Invasion
description:
This is one of my old projects, I'm no longer working on this project. It has a few bugs are I have removed the music since I'm not sure if I can use it in this game. 

Survive waves of zombies on 9 maps, unlock points to buy new weapons!

There is a keyboard/laptop mode where you can use the arrow keys to aim.

Q,E spawns a wall and turret(cant remember in what order lol)

WD left right

Space jump

R reload

F swap weapon(melee weapons are bugged in this build)
